title.narrative: UNOPS project: SG's High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation, engagement

description.narrative: To provide cross regional input and support from civil society and other relevant parties to the Secretary-General's High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services

title.narrative: Successful org.of two regional consultation events in Benin and Indonesia (location TBC)

description.narrative:
Organization of two regional consultation events in Benin and Indonesia (location TBC), which will bring together key actors from government, the private sector and civil society in the region.
The specific objectives of these gatherings are: - Awareness raising: enhance participants’ understanding of the opportunities that digital technologies provide for sustainable development as well as reflect the voice of developing countries in the Panel’s work. - Capacity-building: build participants’ capacity to leverage digital technologies to accelerate progress towards the SDGs by sharing best practices across the region - Technical cooperation: create networks of ‘digital entrepreneurs’ across countries and sectors (government, industry, civil society)
